original: Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….

original: Naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: ▁na a nupādinnupādāniy aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na a nupādinnupādāniy o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁pe

original: Naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁na an upādinn a an upādān iyaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an upādinn a an upādān iyo ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: ▁hetuyā ▁ekūna ti ṃ sa ▁ārammaṇe ▁catu vī sa ▁ adhipatiyā ▁eka vī sa ▁pe ▁āsevan e ▁sattarasa ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekūna ti ṃ sa
